name: retroRepeats
short_description:
PURPOSE

To discover repetitive genomic regions and map them to one another

STRATEGY

(1) Retrieve vector of per-base depths for low mapping quality reads

(2) Fit depth array Poisson distribution

(3) Discover regions of high mapping entropy (low mapping quality)

(4) Iteratively merge regions until pairwise distance entropy is reduced

(5) Map regions to reference genes features

(6) Construct phylogenetic linkage tree of candidate repeats
summary: Retrospective and self-optimizing repeat detection from sequence reads
